name: Nitesh V. Chawla
content: Nitesh Chawla | University of Notre Dame Nitesh Chawla is passionate about AI & data science for the common good. His research is making fundamental advances in artificial intelligence, data science, and network science, and is motivated by the question of how technology can advance the common good through interdisciplinary research. His research is not only at the frontier of fundamental methods and algorithms but is also making interdisciplinary advances through collaborations with faculty at the University of Notre Dame and community, national, and international partners. He is a Fellow of AAAI, ACM, and IEEE. Google Scholar Profile Nitesh Chawla Frank M.
